title: Global Friendship Vol 5 U - Z: Global Friendship Vol 5 United Kingdom - Zambia
description: This is another exciting, educational book from the popular and fun Amara Para series which teaches children from ages 4 - 7 about diversity, global culture and the world. This book along with the others in the Global Friendship collection is an excellent resource for parents, nursery school teachers, primary school teachers and educators to read with children or to children while using the information in the book to teach children about different aspects of different cultures from flags to languages. Come and meet Amara Para's friends from around the world. Learn about the wonderful world of global culture as we take you on a journey through the United Kingdom, Vietnam, Western Samoa, Yemen and Zambia in this colourful and educational book. Celebrate diversity as you learn about Amara Para's many friends, their countries, cultures, languages and the things they love. This is volume five of the Global Friendship collection of books which teach children and parents about diversity and global culture. Come and learn with us about the world.'Fantastic book. My son loves it. We have both learned so much about our own country and others. love it'
author: H. Aitoro
